title: regulations apply would not offend against principles of proper planning and
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Planning and Development Act
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Planning and Development Act 

2000 (Exempted Development) (No.3) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall be included in the collective citation the 

Planning and Development Regulations 2001 to 2021.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited planning development act 2000 (exempted development) (no.3) regulation 2021 (2) regulation shall included collective citation planning development regulation 2001 2021

title: regulations apply would not offend against principles of proper planning and
heading: In these Regulations “relevant period” means the period commencing on
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “relevant period” means the period commencing on 

the making of these Regulations until 31 December 2021.
text_norm: 2 regulation relevant period mean period commencing making regulation 31 december 2021

title: regulations apply would not offend against principles of proper planning and
heading: 3. Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Planning and Development Regulations 2001
text_raw:
3. Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Planning and Development Regulations 2001 
shall have effect during the relevant period as if, in column (1) under the heading 
Class 14, the following paragraph were inserted after paragraph (a): 

“(aa) from use for the sale of food for consumption on the premises to 
use for the sale of food for consumption off the premises.”.
text_norm: 3 part 1 schedule 2 planning development regulation 2001 shall effect relevant period column (1) heading class 14 following paragraph inserted paragraph (a) (aa) use sale food consumption premise use sale food consumption premise

title: regulations apply would not offend against principles of proper planning and
heading: 4. Where a premises is used during the relevant period for the sale of food
text_raw:
4. Where a premises is used during the relevant period for the sale of food 
for consumption off the premises in accordance with Article 3, then, upon the 
expiration of the relevant period - 

(a) 

the premises may be used for the sale of food for consumption on 
the premises in accordance with the permission that applied in 
respect of that premises immediately before the commencement 
of the relevant period, and 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th May, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 (b) 

the use of the premises for the sale of food for consumption off 
the premises shall not be exempted development. 

[208] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 April, 2021. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [208]
